title: Ep. 64. The Stolen Century - Chapter Five
description: Our heroes find themselves in a strange world where artists compete for national pride, submitting their works to a mountain that can make them known throughout the land. Can the team create satisfactory masterpieces before their year is up? Merle gets academic. Taako borrows some pearls of widsom. Magnus meets a fateful friend.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
